abstract: J.M. Smucker Company said Wednesday it would buy the Folgers coffee business from Procter & Gamble in a stock deal it valued at about $3.3 billion, including the assumption of about $350 million of Folgers debt.
lead_paragraph: J.M. Smucker Company said Wednesday it would buy the Folgers coffee business from Procter & Gamble in a stock deal it valued at about $3.3 billion, including the assumption of about $350 million of Folgers debt.
